QUESTION
As salamu allaikum, i am 19 years old and i love a boy who is 20,n both of us are determined to marry each other.there is no problem from my Parents but his parents are not ready for our marriage,as they  want him to get married elsewhere,v cant stay without each other so we have decieded to marry in secret,without telling any1 in the family.my question is,if we marry secretly and then after few months or so if our parents agree can i marry with the same person again,so that we dont hurt the sentiments of our parents.because after they agree to get us married if they cum 2 know tht v r already married they wil finish all reletionships with us.what is the procedure n which nikah wil be jayaz.. Jazak allah..  
ANSWER


Share:

Sister in Islam

Assalamu alaukum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh u

You are basing your question on the premise that the boys parents will agree to him marrying you.What if they don’t agree?

You are also taking a chance with the hope that the marriage will remain a secret.What if the secret is let out? Will the boy be dedicated to you and sustain the pressure of his parents or submit and discard you? Ponder over the questions of these questions and reconsider your intention to marry the boy without the approval of his parents.This will require some sacrifice and restraint but it will be better in your interest.

Nevertheless, the secret marriage will be valid.The second marriage will not affect the validity o the first secret marriage.

And Allah Ta’ala knows best.

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
